name: webidl-conversions
description: Implements the WebIDL algorithms for converting to and from JavaScript values

_scripts_comments.test-no-sab: Node.js internals are broken by deleting SharedArrayBuffer if you run tests on the main thread. Using Mocha's parallel mode avoids this.
